name: ELEMENT
documentation: The leaf variant of `ITEM`, to which a `DATA_VALUE` instance is attached.

null_flavour.name: null_flavour
null_flavour.documentation: Flavour of null value, e.g. `253|unknown|`, `271|no information|`, `272|masked|`, and `273|not applicable|`.

value.name: value
value.documentation: Property representing leaf value object of `ELEMENT`. In real data, any concrete subtype of `DATA_VALUE` can be used.

null_reason.name: null_reason
null_reason.documentation: Optional specific reason for null value; if set, `_null_flavour_` must be set. Null reason may apply only to a minority of clinical data, commonly needed in reporting contexts.

is_null.name: is_null
is_null.documentation: True if value logically not known, e.g. if indeterminate, not asked etc.
